targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "uf" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "valve_state" or r._field == "concentration_cc")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.valve_state != 2)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      id: if r.valve_state == 0 then "Solid" else "Ambient",
      _value: r.concentration_cc,
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> keep(columns: ["id","_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "uf" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "valve_state" or r._field == "conc")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.valve_state == 1)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _field: if r._field == "conc" then "Solid" else r._field,
      _value: r.conc,
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "aeth" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bc6")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])

import "math"

win = 6 + 6
shiftPrev = 6
pointInterval = 30s

base =
  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "co2" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

rollMean =
  base
    |> movingAverage(n: win)
    |> timeShift(duration: -180s)
    |> rename(columns: {_value: "mean_excl"})

rollE2 =
  base
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value*r._value }))
    |> movingAverage(n: win)
    |> timeShift(duration: -180s)
    |> rename(columns: {_value: "e2_excl"})

joined1 = join(
  tables: {o: base, m: rollMean},
  on: ["_time"],
  method: "inner"
)

joined2 = join(
    tables: {jm: joined1, e: rollE2},
    on: ["_time"],
    method: "inner"
)

joined =
  joined2
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
      std = math.sqrt(x: r.e2_excl - r.mean_excl*r.mean_excl)
      outlier = if math.abs(x: r._value - r.mean_excl) > 3.0*std then true else false
      return {_time: r._time, _value: r._value, outlier: outlier}
    })
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.outlier == false)
    |> drop(columns: ["outlier"]) 

joined

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pm" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pm25")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["id", "_field", "_value", "_time"])

import "strings"
import "array"
import "experimental"

rangeMs = int(v: v.timeRangeStop) - int(v: v.timeRangeStart)

opts =
  if rangeMs < 3600000000000 then // 1h in nanoseconds
    {
      timeRangeStart: time(v: int(v: v.timeRangeStop) - 3600000000000),
      timeRangeStop:  v.timeRangeStop
    }
  else
    {
      timeRangeStart: v.timeRangeStart,
      timeRangeStop:  v.timeRangeStop
    }

all_data = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: opts.timeRangeStart, stop: opts.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smps_data" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 6m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  

valve_off_times = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: opts.timeRangeStart, stop: opts.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "uf" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "valve")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 6m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])

joined = join(
  tables: {all: all_data, valveOn: valve_off_times},
  on: ["_time"],
  method: "inner"
)

joined
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.hasPrefix(v: r._field, prefix: "nm"))  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      nm: float(v: strings.replaceAll(v: strings.replaceAll(v: r._field, t: "nm", u: ""), t: "_", u: ".")) 
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     r with nm_bin: r.nm 
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "nm_bin"])

panels.title: Size distribution of Ultrafine Particle Number concentration (#/cm³) - Ambient

import "strings"
import "array"
import "experimental"

rangeMs = int(v: v.timeRangeStop) - int(v: v.timeRangeStart)

opts =
  if rangeMs < 3600000000000 then // 1h in nanoseconds
    {
      timeRangeStart: time(v: int(v: v.timeRangeStop) - 3600000000000),
      timeRangeStop:  v.timeRangeStop
    }
  else
    {
      timeRangeStart: v.timeRangeStart,
      timeRangeStop:  v.timeRangeStop
    }

all_data = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: opts.timeRangeStart, stop: opts.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smps_data" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 6m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  

valve_on_times = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: opts.timeRangeStart, stop: opts.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "uf" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "valve")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 6m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])

joined = join(
  tables: {all: all_data, valveOn: valve_on_times},
  on: ["_time"],
  method: "inner"
)

joined
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.hasPrefix(v: r._field, prefix: "nm"))  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      nm: float(v: strings.replaceAll(v: strings.replaceAll(v: r._field, t: "nm", u: ""), t: "_", u: ".")) 
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     r with nm_bin: r.nm 
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "nm_bin"])

panels.title: Size distribution of Ultrafine Particle Number concentration (#/cm³) - Solid

targets.query:
import "strings"

rangeMs = int(v: v.timeRangeStop) - int(v: v.timeRangeStart)

opts =
  if rangeMs < 3600000000000 then // 1h in nanoseconds
    {
      timeRangeStart: time(v: int(v: v.timeRangeStop) - 3600000000000),
      timeRangeStop:  v.timeRangeStop
    }
  else
    {
      timeRangeStart: v.timeRangeStart,
      timeRangeStop:  v.timeRangeStop
    }


valve_off_times = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: opts.timeRangeStart, stop: opts.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "uf" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "valve")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])

all_data = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: opts.timeRangeStart, stop: opts.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smps_data" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.hasPrefix(v: r._field, prefix: "nm"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)


joined = join(
  tables: {all: all_data, valveOff: valve_off_times},
  on: ["_time"],
  method: "inner"
)

joined
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      nm: float(v: strings.replaceAll(
            v: strings.replaceAll(v: r._field, t: "nm", u: ""),
            t: "_", u: "."
          ))
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with hourly_valve_off: r._value }))
  |> keep(columns: ["nm", "hourly_valve_off"])
  |> sort(columns: ["nm"])

import "strings"

rangeMs = int(v: v.timeRangeStop) - int(v: v.timeRangeStart)

opts =
  if rangeMs < 3600000000000 then // 1h in nanoseconds
    {
      timeRangeStart: time(v: int(v: v.timeRangeStop) - 3600000000000),
      timeRangeStop:  v.timeRangeStop
    }
  else
    {
      timeRangeStart: v.timeRangeStart,
      timeRangeStop:  v.timeRangeStop
    }


valve_on_times = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: opts.timeRangeStart, stop: opts.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "uf" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "valve")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])

all_data = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: opts.timeRangeStart, stop: opts.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smps_data" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => strings.hasPrefix(v: r._field, prefix: "nm"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)


joined = join(
  tables: {all: all_data, valveOn: valve_on_times},
  on: ["_time"],
  method: "inner"
)

joined
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      nm: float(v: strings.replaceAll(
            v: strings.replaceAll(v: r._field, t: "nm", u: ""),
            t: "_", u: "."
          ))
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with hourly_valve_on: r._value }))
  |> keep(columns: ["nm", "hourly_valve_on"])
  |> sort(columns: ["nm"])

panels.title: Hourly size distribution of Ultrafine Particle Number concentration (#/cm³), catalyticlally stripped and ambient.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "mitrap006")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ypen" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
        |> keep(columns: ["_time","_field","_value"])
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "org" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ppcc")
  |> keep(columns: ["id", "_field", "_value", "_time"])

from(bucket: "mitrap006")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "inorg" and r.installation == "${AQH_Station}")
    |> keep(columns: ["_time","_field","_value"])
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "mitrap006")
  |> range(start: -10d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smps_data" and exists r.instrument)
  |> keep(columns: ["instrument", "_time"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["instrument"])
  |> limit(n:1)
list.name: mpss_name
